articles.title: Geopolitics, AI to slow global economy, grow inequality: Davos survey - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Economists predict weakened global economic conditions while technology will help promote differences across regions.
articles.content:
Geopolitical strife and tight financing conditions will slow global economic growth, while artificial intelligence (AI) will increase inequality, according to leading economists.
